content:
Hello :-) Sorry for the last minute planning, but here is the link for the Dumbo Festival ! Let's hang out  and enjoy together if time allows :)

http://dumboartsfestival.com/
http://dumboartsfestival.com/find-art

Check projects on the page, and look what you're interested in, then we can arrange the time :)

As there are so many events,  it might be hard to look up on the web.......;) if so, let's just pick the time! 

Hope you're having nice friday night :)
name: Yoon Hanna

content: Thanks for sharing! This event looks rad. The night projections sound like a really cool thing to see. What if we went tomorrow evening around sunset? Maybe we could grab a drink after.
